body: ‘Ike Hana No‘eau & Nā Leo Manu Programs        Lei Wili Making NPS/Jay Robinson       ʻIke Hana Noʻeau - "Experience the Skillful Work" E komo mai...come join the island's practitioners as they share the arts and culture of Hawaiʻi. Nā Leo Manu - "Heavenly Voices" Nā Leo Manu is an evening concert series of free Hawaiian music featuring the finest musicians and halāu. Childrens Programs Such as 'Ohana Day and Junior Ranger Day      Please visit the Nā Leo Manu Video Archive      link to pdf version of August 10 poster (664KB)              link to pdf version of August 20 poster (754KB)              link to pdf version of August 26 poster (321KB)              Return to Calendar page
title: Hawai'i Volcanoes National Park: 'Ike Hana No'eau & Nā Leo Manu Programs
